mapper.select: select * from (select b.* , rownum r from (select * from freeboard order by ref desc , re_step asc) b) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
mapper.update: update freeboard set re_step=re_step+1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step > #{re_step}
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(num, writer, email, subject, passwd, reg_date, ref, re_step, re_level, content, ip, isfile) values(freeboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{passwd}, sysdate, #{ref}, #{re_step}, #{re_level}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{isfile} )
mapper.update: update freeboard set readcount=readcount+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select passwd from freeboard where num = #{num}
